dublin_core.dcvalue: Sarah Andersson, Senior Technical Advisor, JSI, sarah_andersson@jsi.com

The overall goal of cStock is to improve reporting and visibility of community health logistics data. It is a RapidSMS-based reporting and resupply system that facilitates timely data transmission and communication between the CHWs and the facility that supplies them with medicines.
Made available in DSpace on 2020-10-14T10:19:25Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 1 cstock_se.pdf: 355436 bytes, checksum: 256f94c828418312193e204ce6c7cb4e (MD5)

Data collection and reporting, Electronic decision support, Supply chain management, Child health, Family Planning, Malaria and other vector-borne diseases
